notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The study was supported by funding from National University Basic Scientific Research Special Foundation (2020kfyXGYJ00), China National GeneBank (CNGB) and Guangdong Provincial Key Laboratory of Genome Read and Write (No. 2017B030301011), Natural Science Foundation of Guangdong Province (2017A030306026), Funds for Distinguished Young Scholar of South China University of China (2017JQ017).
